title: Breaking the Mold: EMM's The DUMB Tour Blends Power, Performance, and Purpose
tags: Instagram;Facebook;GENESIS: THE DOC AND THE SHOWA phenomenal live show and powerful documentary about the unique challenges of women in music. Doc Summary: Female songwriters, dancers, musicians, underground artists and studio owners shed light on the dark side of the music industry while showing the creative and perilous path of the artist EMM building her epic live show, “Genesis.” Show Summary: Icon-in-the-making EMM performs her outrageously creative live show, “Genesis” based on her powerful short film “The Trilogy.” Viewing: This edit is ideal for viewing on computer, phone, and social media. Headphones or speakers are recommended for ideal sonic experience. Sharing: If you enjoy the show, feel free to share small clips on social media but please do not put full or large chunks (over 35 seconds) of clips on your social media or websites. Please support the independent artist by sharing links to this site and tagging her social media @EMMinRealLife so that the artist can be compensated fairly for her work.
